name: Markdown Editing - Section Mover
description: Moves an existing section of a markdown file to another location (after or before another section) based on a user prompt, preserving the eventual section hierarchy.
author: @@official.shinkai

prompt.description: The user prompt describing how sections should be moved

md_file_path.description: The file path of the markdown file to process

action_details.description: Detailed description of the move action performed

action_done.description: A short description of the action performed or error message

moved_section_details.description: The content of the markdown section that was moved

updated_file_path.description: The path of the updated markdown file after moving sections
